title: Aníbal Fernández facts for kids
snippet: Aníbal Domingo Fernández, born on January 9, 1957, is an Argentine politician. He is a Justicialist Party member, a lawyer, and a certified public accountant. He has been a close supporter of former Presidents Néstor Kirchner and Cristina Fernández de Kirchner.

title: Aníbal Fernández - Wikipedia
snippet: Aníbal Domingo Fernández (born January 9, 1957) is an Argentine Justicialist Party politician, lawyer, and certified public accountant. Throughout his career, he has remained a close ally to the former Presidents Néstor Kirchner and Cristina Fernández de Kirchner.

title: "El daño es superlativo": Aníbal Fernández llamó a "levantar la voz" contra el Gobierno POLÍTICA El Intransigente
snippet: El exjefe de Gabinete, Aníbal Fernández, analizó la situación actual de Argentina en una entrevista con Radio 10 y se mostró duramente crítico con el Gobierno.
